snippet: Documents made public as a result of a lawsuit between the sugar industry and the corn refiners association — which supply billions of dollars a year worth of sweeteners to sodas and other processed foods — have provided a rare behind-the-scenes...
lead_paragraph: Documents made public as a result of a lawsuit between the sugar industry and the corn refiners association — which supply billions of dollars a year worth of sweeteners to sodas and other processed foods — have provided a rare behind-the-scenes look at how two giant players enlisted academics and nonprofits as they fought a fierce battle for market share.

headline.main: A War Over Sweetener Market Share
